list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a scientific procedure undertaken to make a discovery, test a hypothesis, or demonstrate a known fact.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I have tested this by experiment
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đã thử nghiệm điều này bằng thí nghiệm

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: perform a scientific procedure, especially in a laboratory, to determine something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she experimented on chickens as well as mice
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy đã thử nghiệm trên gà cũng như chuột
